description: The attributes that describe information specific to databases.
caption: Database
name: database

database_type.description: The type of the database, such as relational, NoSQL, or graph.

database_version.description: The version of the database software.

database_size.description: The size of the database in bytes or a human-readable format.

database_schema.description: The schema or structure of the database tables and relationships.

database_backup_policy.description: The backup policy for the database, including frequency and retention.

database_encryption.description: Indicates whether the database is encrypted at rest and/or in transit.
